games.title: Cage's Declaration Run
games.author: Community
games.theme: Nic Cage must steal the Declaration of Independence again, but this time it's harder
games.description: Dodge security lasers as Nic Cage to steal the Declaration of Independence. Bullet hell gameplay with Comic Sans MS font.

games.title: HELLCORD MOD: Flap & Ban
games.author: Community
games.theme: You're a Discord admin moderating a server that's slowly descending into chaos
games.description: Manage a Discord server for demons as an imp moderator. Flap through channel gates while fake microtransaction popups block your view. Stay airborne, stay employed.
